= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *SCA.SC.LCV* || Lateral Cervical Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay Low-threshold Mechanoreceptors to CR || from Lamina V ||
|| *SCA.SC.LSN* || Lateral Spinal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Integrate autonomic and homeostatic functions || Projects to HT and lateral globus pallidus ||
|| *SCA.SC.CCV* || Central Cervical Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Coordinate voluntary movements, maintain balance, and learn motor skills || Receive neck and vestibular input and project to CR and vestibular nuclei ||
|| *SCA.SC.SPCR* || Sacral Precerebellar Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay unconscious proprioception, motor feedback to CR || Lower extremity and trunk, relay motor feedback to CR ||
|| *SCA.SC.CBS* || Centrobasalis Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Unconscious proprioception to CR || Upper extremity, relay motor feedback to CR, <BR>major site of termination for dorsal root fibers ||
|| *SCA.SC.RPL* || Retroposteriolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limbs muscles || ||
|| *SCA.SC.PM* || Posteromedial Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.MM* || Medial Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.PL* || Posterolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.LM* || Lateral Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.PHR* || Phrenic Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of diaphragm || Projections from Nucleus Solitarius ||
